description:
The members of the Society, Zeta, Vaseraga, Beatrix, and Eustace are the focus of this episode.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fuuin Kaijo no Aikotoba / Taiki Suru Vazaraga? / Inuha to Mahou no Item
Zeta`s Way with Passwords / Vaseraga Stands By? / Dog Lover and Magical Item
封印解除の合い言葉 / 待機するバザラガ? / 犬派と魔法のアイテム
